metadata.name: LordOfEverything
metadata.description:
[h1][b]Lord Of Everything[/b][/h1]
[b]Features[/b] - Select which Passive Items, Familiars, Active Items or Trinkets to start the game with - All selected Passives and Familiars will all be added - Trinkets will be added and smelted - only 20 of the selected Active items will load into the starting room. This is intentional to keep the room clean. - this mod only works with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2487535818]Mod Config Menu Continued[/url], it will not do anything without it.
[b]Source[/b] [url=https://github.com/DustyFlapdragon/LordOfEverything]GitHub Repo[/url]
